channel.title: Need major help with a hacker
channel.description: So, I have recently had a guy get on my server and he keeps getting peoples passwords, he has the option to delete player files, and he is ratting all the player files. Please tell me how I can remove this kid from using a cheat client or whatever he is using.

item.title: Need major help with a hacker
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Download anti-virus software and scan your computer.

Malwarebytes

Free Cyber Security & Anti-Malware Software

Malwarebytes protects you against malware, ransomware, and other advanced online threats that have made antivirus obsolete and ineffective.

Read full topic
item.source: Need major help with a hacker

item.title: Need major help with a hacker
item.dc:creator: @God_Pure1 God_Pure
item.description:
@God_Pure1 wrote:

dude, you probably have a keylogger or some kind of rat on your computer, I would reinstall it or clean it (not phisically) as fast as possible before he gets all your passwords and change them via someone elseâ€™s computer while this is still happening
